name: Octavia: Bridge between Earth and Mars
name_original: Octavia: Bridge between Earth and Mars
description:
This game is a science fiction 3rd person shooter and platformer, with lots of adventure and exploration throughout the maps. Each level in the game can take from 15 mins to 1 hour to complete and every level is jam packed with puzzles, action, and exploration around every turn. The game is set in the Milkyway galaxy thousands of years after humanity’s extinction, the planets Mars and Earth have been pulled close together by orbital changes (close enough for there to be a bridge in between). You are a puppet, a stuffed animal who has been infused with the soul of a human, who was once alive before the extinction. Your task is to return to Earth from Mars, to do that you need to cross the space bridge called Octavia.

Developed by: Griffin Dickie

St#: 215591050
